version_description:
- Add Jeep/Chrysler CRD Engine improvements
- Review App icon
- Fix issue during connection (can cause crash)

- New charts (grid, scrooling time, color can be customized)
- Display chart statistics at the end of the record
- Record files can be renammed
- User guide is included inside the application (no internet required)
- New launch screen

- Improve reading and clear of faults for many brand (i.e. Fiat, Ford, etc).
- Add translation for the fault code description (Polish, Spanish, Portuguese, etc).
- Correct issues seen on the chart mode (include the display issue on iPad running iOS 9).
- Code optimization to reduce the size of the application
- Translation into Danish.

- Add battery voltage parameter (available inside chart)
- Correct issue which sometimes cause the lost of WiFi signal.
- Add brands: Bentley, MG, Datsun, Saturn et Scion
- Improvement done for Volvo car
- Improvement done for Peugeot/Citroen 1.4 HDi engine

- Improve application reading speed
- Fix issue with OBDLink MX interface
- Improve DTC reading with dCi engine
- Improve connection with older Opel/Chevrolet vehicle
- Add translations
- Fix issue when starting the application with iOS inferior to 9.0

- Improve chart refreshing speed from 30% to 50%
- Solve an issue of UI with iOS 10
- Improve connexion with Toyota
- Solve issues and improve reading of faults with Land Rover and Volvo

The "Premium version" is now the "Basic Edition". The functionnalities are exactly the same in the Basic Edition as they were in the Premium Version. You still have access to the functionnalities you paid for.

We added new functionnalities which are available in the "Plus Edition" :
+ Generate report of the diagnosis you can print and share with your customer
+ Advanced chart option, reload data
+ New performance test

If you lost the access to the Basic Edition go in the "Help" menu, then tap on "Unlock Basic/Plus Edition".
Tap on "restore" button at the top left of the purchase screen, you will not be charged and the Basic Edition access will be activated.

The “Premium Version” is now the “Basic Edition”. The features of Basic Edition are exactly the same as the Premium version. You still have access to the functions for which you paid.

We have added new features that are available in the “Plus Edition”:
- Ability to generate and print diagnostic reports
- Advanced graphical functions: reviewing data
- Additional performance tests
If you have lost access to the Basic Edition, simply restore the application by going into the “help” menu and “Unlock Basic/Plus functions”. In the top right is the “Restore” button .

- Improve erasing of fault with Peugeot/Citroen
- Improve Ford connection
- Add support for klavkarr product (Bluetooth)

- Improve compatibility with older vehicles (2002/2006)
- Solve issue with diagnostic report generation

- Solve issue when erasing which may happens with vehicle before 2008
- Add DTC descriptions (now more than 9000 description are available)
- New splash screen

- Solve issue when reading DTC on Opel/Chevrolet vehicle
- Improve connection to TCM on Jepp
- Improve connection with light duty vehicle from VAG
- Improve reading of fault with Hyundai/Kia

- Add definitions for fault codes for Ford, Volkswagen/Audi
- Add definitions for new engine generation (Euro 6.2)
- Improve connection with Hyundai/Kia

- Add VIN decoder functionality
- Saving diagnostic data also record freeze frames
- Improve connection and DTC reading with Toyota/Lexus and Mitsubishi
- Solve issues with diagnosis reports
- Solve issue with in App Purchase

- Adapt application for iPhone X display
- New sheet to select freeze frame
- Improve reading accuracy of battery voltage with KLAVKARR device
- Improve detection of the ECM for Jeep/Chrysler with CRD engine
- Improve behaviour of the application with faulty ELM327 firmware
- Solve issue with « ELM KLAVKARR » screen

- Improve connection for Porsche (Transmission)
- Improve connection for Volvo (Engine and Transmission)
- Add data for Renault/Dacia Engine
- Faster vehicule connection
- Minor design reviews
- Fix issue with restoring license
- Fix issue with DTC descriptions

- Added KW1281 protocol for VAG (klavkarr only)
- Improvement for BMW
- Add support for device working with Bluetooth 4.0

- Add TCM diagnostic data for Renault and Dacia
- Improve and solve issue with PSA for reading/clearing faults
- Improve connection with Ford from 1996 to 1999
- Improve reading of DTC for Opel

- Solve issue with sensor list inside the graphic mode
- Add DTC description for Hyundai/Kia and Ford

- Add 2 icons to display the status of the connetion with the interface and vehicle
- Add the possibility to select ECU to diagnose
- Improvement of the design with iPad

- Add share button for diagnosis and report
- Add a new screen to test electronic device
- Improve VIN decoder with latest model (2017/2018)

- Solve issue with sensor list inside the graphic mode
- Add DTC description for Hyundai/Kia and Ford

- Improve TCM connection with Toyota and Ssangyong
- Improve Suzuki AWD connection

- Improve connection with Mitsubishi vehicle

- Add user guide in German

- Trace until 4 banks in graphic mode

- Improve WiFi issues detection

- Improve sensor reading with Opel
- Improve connexion to transmission ECU for VAG and BMW
- Fix issue with « bad » ELM327 firmware

- Improve connection to Subaru ECM
- Improve data read for Mitsubishi
- Add definitions for Renault/Dacia
- Add vehicle make (Abarth, Alpine, ...)

- Improve connection with transmission ECU (gearbox and transfert case)
- Improve vehicle connection speed and graphic reading speed
- Add diagnostic data for Ford

- Improve connection to transmission ECU with Jeep/Chrysler/Dodge
- Better detection of OBD ECU name

- Improve connection to ECM / TCM of vehicle which use 2 different protocols

- Solve connection issues
